properties.areaDesc: Niagara River to Hamlin Beach NY; Niagara River to Hamlin Beach NY beyond 5NM off shoreline to US-Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 17 at 1:38PM EST until January 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds to 35 knots and waves 11 to 15 feet expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore and open waters of Lake Ontario from the
Niagara River to Hamlin Beach.

* WHEN...From 11 PM Saturday to 10 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM SATURDAY TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY
